item.title: From on-device AI to the ‘girlfriend index,’ trading ideas from the research firm that nailed 2025’s investment themes
item.description: Citrini Research nailed many investment themes for 2025. Here are a handful of ideas they see delivering potential in 2026.

item.title: Flu season is ‘early’ and ‘aggressive’ in New York City. Here’s what that means for the rest of the country.
item.description: A new variant called H3N2 subclade K is causing most of the illness this season

item.title: Fear of losing your job is no way to get employees on board with AI
item.description: Companies want workers to embrace AI — but a hardline ultimatum will backfire

item.title: Why Trump Media is getting into the nuclear business with $6 billion TAE deal
item.description: Trump Media’s stock is soaring as the Truth Social operator looks to get in on a hot AI power trend.

item.title: The next year will be for stock picking — and the next two weeks should see gains, says Goldman Sachs
item.description: One interpretation of options market pricing by Goldman Sachs, says stocks won’t be tugging the same way next year.
